description:
The Chinese division has revealed their ultimate weapon: a girl with an anthrax surgery base.  Unless she`s killed, there is no hope of defeating them and reclaiming Annex 1. Alexander goes in alone into the anthrax-covered spaceship to assassinate her.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: MAN ON A MISSION 兵士と父親
Man on a Mission: Heishi to Chichioya
Man on a Mission: Soldier and Father
